entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Bagotville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 p.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
